sentences.english: Europol said more than 100 people had been arrested in coordinated raids across 10 countries.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲刑警組織稱與10個國家協作逮捕了100多人。

sentences.english: But DESI also presents an additional boon to gumshoes.
sentences.chinese: 但吸附電噴霧離子化技術對刑警還有額外的好處。

sentences.english: Now the alert for his detainment has spread across all Interpol member states.
sentences.chinese: 現在逮捕他的警報已經遍及所有國際刑警組織會員國。

sentences.english: Chen Yilong wants to transfer into gumshoe team, meet with captain is earnest boycott.

sentences.english: The criminal police are working on a major case.

sentences.english: Awn teaches the Wu Xu of Chinese gumshoe institute this year 74 years old.
sentences.chinese: 中國刑警學院的吳旭芒教授今年74歲了。

sentences.english: Lestrade – Peter Ricoletti, NO. 1 on Interpol's most wanted list since 1982.

definition: SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
to solve a case/shabby old table
escaped criminal/fugitive from the law (criminal suspect on the run)
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
